name: rabbida
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)))

comment: Equivalent wff's yield equal restricted class abstractions (deduction form). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
